title: LNGRZUI Documentation
description: LNGRZUI is the documentation website for the UI Library, which is a collection of reusable components for building user interfaces

meta.title: LNGRZUI - Documentation
meta.description: LNGRZUI is the documentation website for the UI Library, which is a collection of reusable components for building user interfaces
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: The Getting Started page provides an introduction to the reusable component library and guides you through the initial setup process.
content.intro-desc: LNGRZUI Starter is a repository that contains a collection of reusable UI components that can be used across multiple web applications. The components have been developed with React.js and TypeScript and are fully customizable to fit the design needs of any web application.
content.setup-desc: To get started with the LNGRZUI repository, you will need to have Node.js and npm installed on your computer. If you don't have them installed, you can download them from the official Node.js website.
content.component-desc: Here is the documentation for the UI components, you can check the collection of reusable components for building user interfaces here.
content.feature-one: A collection of reusable UI components
content.feature-three: Fully customizable to fit the design needs of any web application
content.feature-four: Easy to use and integrate into your existing web application
content.feature-five: Includes documentation on how to use the components
